item.title: Anti-ICE mobs bankrolled by 'shadowy interests' putting law enforcement in danger, CEO warns
item.description: Violent ICE protests in Minnesota allegedly driven by outside actors exploiting chaos, warns protest insider as confrontations escalate across the state.
